notes.content: MAJOR SYSTEM UPGRADE COMPLETED: Added ReAct architecture, Web access, Vector memory, and Task planning capabilities. Guardian now has modern AI agent capabilities with 666-step execution limit and 20-step ReAct default. All functions tested and working.

NEW TOOLS AVAILABLE: plan_step, act_step, reflect, react_cycle, web_search, fetch_url, call_api, get_weather, translate_text, store_embedding_memory, search_embedding_memory, summarize_conversation, create_event, get_upcoming_events, reschedule_event, complete_event, get_event_statistics, create_task_list
Step limits corrected: Main cycle 666 steps, ReAct cycle 20 steps default, recommendations 1-20 steps. Async issues resolved with proper coroutine handling and quota error management.

NEXT PHASE: Social Intelligence (detect_user_state, suggest_empathic_reply), Code Tools (run_code, evaluate_script, unit_test), Database Tools (query_db, search_database), Agent Roles (assign_agent_role, handover_task_to), Mobile Version Development

TERMINAL ACCESS ADDED: run_terminal_command, get_system_info, diagnose_network. Guardian can now execute safe commands, get system information, and diagnose network connectivity. Security measures implemented to block dangerous commands.

NEW TERMINAL TOOLS: run_terminal_command(command) - Execute safe terminal commands with 30s timeout, get_system_info() - Comprehensive system information (CPU, memory, disk, network), diagnose_network() - Network connectivity tests (ping, DNS, HTTP)
TERMINAL SECURITY: Blocked dangerous commands (rm -rf, sudo, chmod, dd, shutdown, etc.), 30-second timeout, project directory isolation, comprehensive logging for audit trail
CURRENT SYSTEM STATUS: All modern AI capabilities working - ReAct architecture, Web access, Vector memory, Task planning, Terminal access. System is fully operational with comprehensive toolset.
